sentence.text: Mutations in the membrane frizzled-related protein (MFRP/embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching) gene, specifically expressed in the retinal pigment epithelium (carbohydrate metabolic process) and ciliary body, cause nanophthalmia or posterior microphthalmia with retinitis pigmentosa in humans, and photoreceptor degeneration in epidermis development.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching

sentence.text: In Mfrprd6 eyes, a significant 1.5- to 2.0-fold decrease was observed among transcripts of genes linked to retinal degeneration, including those involved in visual cycle (Rpe65, retinol metabolic process, visual perception), phototransduction (Pde6a, Guca1b, negative regulation of signal transduction), and photoreceptor disc morphogenesis (visual perception and Fscn2).
Transcripts of Prss56, a gene associated with angle-closure glaucoma, posterior microphthalmia and myopia, were increased in embryo development ending in birth or egg hatchingrd6 eyes by 17-fold.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
